author: gstein
msg: ho fuggin ho

author: gstein
msg: Add some logic for srcdir != builddir builds.
* Makefile.in: rename mkinstalldirs symbol to MKDIR. build-outputs.mk now
defines BUILD_DIRS rather than CLEAN_DIRS, so change the local-clean
rule. add the "mkdir-init" rule which uses BUILD_DIRS to create build
directories.
* configure.in: (from Mo DeJong) add $(top_srcdir) into the INCLUDE_OUTPUTS
symbol so the file can be picked up from the srcdir.
add call to "make mkdir-init" when srcdir!=builddir.
* gen-make.py: in the output (build-outputs.mk): rename CLEAN_DIRS to
BUILD_DIRS. rename mkinstalldirs to MKDIR.

author: gstein
msg: Add logic for building the docs. New targets are "doc" for the "typical"
stuff (info, txt, html). doc-* will create the varieties of formats.
There is no longer for ensuring proper tools are present. If a rule fails
because a tool isn't there... deal with it. :-)

author: kfogel
msg: Submitted by: Mike Sussman <msussman@collab.net>:
(merge_from_wc_top): New test for merging.
(test_list): Run it.

author: kfogel
msg: * client/main.c, tests/libsvn_delta/random-test.c:
(main): Rename `optarg' to `opt_arg' to avoid compilation warning
about shadowing a global variable.
